div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Parent Portal has temporarily been suspended until grading guidelines for remote learning have been finalized.
div.h3: For your safety, the following methods are preferred.
div.p:
1. Turn in on Google Classroom (How to video, with Spanish subtitles)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9PsDYaPIP9g&featur...

2. Take a picture and email to the teacher (see photo steps below) or submit via another communication app such as Remind, Class Dojo, or Talking Points that allow photos or attachments to be sent to the teacher.
If the preferred methods are not feasible, then there is a Packet Drop Off available.
Tubs will be available for District (Pk-12) packet drop off on Mondays between 10:30 AM-12:30 PM or 5:00-6:00 PM at the Hermes Intermediate Campus 631 E Milam St

div.h1: Proceso de retorno del trabajo de los estudiantes
div.h4: Para su seguridad, se prefieren los siguientes métodos.
div.p:
1. Entregar en Google Classroom (Cómo hacer un video, con subtítulos en español)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9PsDYaPIP9g&featur...

2. Tome una foto y envíela por correo electrónico al profesor (ver los pasos de la foto más abajo) o envíela a través de otra aplicación de comunicación como Remind, Class Dojo o Talking Points que permite enviar fotos o archivos adjuntos al profesor.
Si los métodos preferidos no son factibles, entonces hay una entrega de paquetes disponible.
Cajas estarán disponibles para la entrega de paquetes del Distrito (Pk-12) los lunes entre 10:30AM-12:30 PM o 5:00-6:00 PM en el Hermes Intermediate Campus 631 E Milam St.

p.a: Haga clic aquí para ver la versión completa

li.a: How to Turn in Work on Google Classroom

div.p: Below you will find links to all grade level online resources for your student. These resources are intended to be enrichment activities for your child as the District moves from a traditional school setting to an online delivery of instruction. These sites provide a meaningful resource to help students engage in learning activities to continue the educational process during the District’s transition. Your students are familiar with many of these links. If students need reminders of their logins, please contact their teacher.

District
560 North Monroe
La Grange, TX 78945
Phone: 979-968-7000
Fax: 979-968-8155
